text: le’ineziya yanini inesu zenidi betewiratina be’inijili tets’ifo yemiyagenyutini yemayits’ifina yemayanebi nebiyi yehonewini melikitenya yemiketelu lehonuti (be’irigit’i its’ifiletalehu)፡፡ bebego sira yazachewali፡፡ kekifumi negeri yikelekilachewali፡፡ melikami negerochinimi lenerisu yifek’idilachewali፡፡ met’ifo negerochinimi be’inerisu layi irimi yaderigibachewali፡፡ ke’inesumi layi shekimachewinina ineziyanimi be’inerisu layi yeneberutini inizazilawochi (kebadi higigatochi) yanesalachewali፡፡ ineziyami be’irisu yamenu yakeberutimi yeredutimi yaninimi ke’irisu gari yeteweredewini birihani yeteketelu ineziya inesu yemiyadinu nachewi፡፡
